name: It's the Pigeons Mr. President!
description:
It's the Pigeons Mr. President! is a 10 minutes game about plane, Mr. President and a lot of pigeons. The pigeons are crazy and want to kill Mr. President! It's up to you to steer the airplane to safety. But watch out, you have ONLY ONE jet engine working! 

Expect pigeon attack formations, pigeon death walls, homing pigeons and pigeon tornadoes.

Made in less than 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2019

Controls
Arrow keys or WAD keys

Made by Dukla Team
Radim Kratochvíl
Nikita Vaňků
Otello Guadagnoli
